name: Publicly Accessible Alibaba ApsaraDB Instances From Security Rule
query: query { dbInstances ( where: { cloudProvider: "alibaba" publicAccessBlocked: false securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } }){ identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
